item.description:
ComiCONN "A Show for the Fans by the Fans!"

Artists! Panels! Exclusives!

Over 100 Dealer & Guest tables! Action Figure Design Contest!

"LIVE ART" Mural! The 501st Conn Squad! Kamino Base Rebel Legion! Star Wars Trivia Contest! Comics! Toys! Live music by High Adventure! The Batmobile! Dana Powers with R2-D2! The Witch's Dungeon! Special Star Wars guest Anthony Forrest! And much more!

Look for an exclusive Indiana Jones - Star Wars print by Matt Busch at the show!

Kids 10 and under are FREE!

Check out the ComiCONN website at:

http:// www.comiconn.com

www.comiconn.com

Fans can join their e-mail list at: comiconnshow@yahoo.com
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes. I will have a purple back pack.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group
